about_the_game:
◆◇◆ Introduction ◆◇◆

Four event CGs from the eternal and changeless ADV “Living in Spring” are available as digital wallpapers.

The images are drawn by “Chifuri”.
Ash-based color draws up the world of “Living in Spring”.

◆◇◆ Contents ◆◇◆

This DLC contains 4 images of event CGs.
Each image has some different images of its own.

◆◇◆ Attention ◆◇◆

The purchase of this DLC forms part of the license conditions in the secondary terms of use of "Living in Spring".
For more information, please refer to the information on the main unit.
detailed_description:
◆◇◆ Introduction ◆◇◆

Four event CGs from the eternal and changeless ADV “Living in Spring” are available as digital wallpapers.

The images are drawn by “Chifuri”.
Ash-based color draws up the world of “Living in Spring”.

◆◇◆ Contents ◆◇◆

This DLC contains 4 images of event CGs.
Each image has some different images of its own.

◆◇◆ Attention ◆◇◆

The purchase of this DLC forms part of the license conditions in the secondary terms of use of "Living in Spring".
For more information, please refer to the information on the main unit.
name: Living in Spring - Full Size Event CG for digital wallpaper

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Living in Spring - Full Size Event CG for digital wallpaper - $3.50

package_groups.title: Buy Living in Spring - Full Size Event CG for digital wallpaper

short_description: “Eternity and changeless were with this images” - Of the images that colored the eternal and unchanging ADV “Living in Spring”, four event CGs are sent out as digital wallpapers. The Spring will never return, and you're moving on...
